step.cmd: Open the Document Chat plugin panel
Click on the Message text area

info.p: The Document Chat plugin uses a subset of Markdown for formatting the messages.
To begin a new paragraph, you actually need a blank line between them. Press Shift+Return twice to add a new paragraph.
To format text bold, wrap it with two asterisks: **text**.
To format it italic, wrap it in underscores: _text_
To format it as code, wrap it in backticks: `text`

To add links, either write the url (for example, https://xdplugins.pabloklaschka.de) or, to add a customized link text, write it like this: [link text](link target). For example: [Link Text](https://xdplugins.pabloklaschka.de)
Images aren't supported for privacy (as they'd require fetching them from the internet).
